org.apache.archiva.metadata.model

Class ProjectMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.metadata.model.ProjectMetadata

  • public class ProjectMetadata
extends Object
    Metadata on project level. Namely the namespace and the project id. But different repository types may add additional metadata information.

        public String getNamespace()
        Returns the namespace where the project resides.
        Returns:
        The namespace.

      • setNamespace

        public void setNamespace(String namespace)
        Sets the namespace. Namespaces are strings that may contain '.' characters to separate the hierarchy levels.

      • addProperty

        public void addProperty(String key,
                        String value)
        Adds a custom property. Repository storage implementations may add custom properties on the project level.
        Parameters:
        key -
        value -

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Replaces all custom properties with the given properties object. The given object is stored by reference and not copied.
        Parameters:
        properties -

      • getProperties

        public Properties getProperties()
        Returns the object with all custom properties. If there are no custom properties set, a empty object will be returned.
        Returns:
        The custom properties.

      • hasProperties

        public boolean hasProperties()
        Returns true, if there are custom properties set.
        Returns:
        True, if there exist custom properties.
